website_summaries.verdict: Intuit QuickBooks Premier 2009 keeps the program's well-designed, intuitive interface, while adding a few new features. It's a worthy upgrade for people serious about online banking, and it remains the best accounting program for small business owners. However, Intuit should be more generous with customer support, particularly for setup issues.
pros: Intuit QuickBooks Premier 2009 offers improved online banking tools
Company Snapshot screen for quick business overview
a free Web site for one year
support for international payments and most world currencies
better client data-review tools for accountants
cons: QuickBooks Premier 2009 suffers some glitches with online banking setup
Live Community not as responsive as it should be
no free support for setup issues
sluggish performance on Vista PCs with 1GB of RAM

customer_reviews.title: Useless Software Quickbooks 2009
customer_reviews.text: when one buy a software (in this case Quickbooks 2009), he is expecting to install it and use it; and to install a software, it is almost always prompted during the installation processes a serial number, and in the case of this Quickbooks 2009, an user number and a product number, which this item i bought did not include!!! IT SEEMS SELLER IS MAKING FOOL OF THE BUYER, WHAT I GOT (A SOFTWARE!!!) IS IN REALITY, A PIECE OF PLASTIC !!!]
customer_reviews.author: Henry C Sy

customer_reviews.title: Use only if you want this specific year
customer_reviews.text: It is an older version so if your looking for it that would be fine but otherwise I would recommend a new version.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bojrab

customer_reviews.title: QUICKBOOKS PRO
customer_reviews.text: This software is extensive. There is more for business then just a person wanting to keep track of their expenses but all the options are nice for reports and printouts. I am just frustrated with Intuit as they try to suck you into online connections that feel invasive. Be careful what buttons you push when you are registaring. They are persistant in trying to get you to registar. In fact you do not have a choice. So read everything carefully. The product is good the company is to agressive.
customer_reviews.author: MF Minnis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The key code had been used before and I was locked out after 30 days. Called Intuit. Would need to buy new. Would never have bought this if I new it was only good for 30 days. Used versions should not be allowed to be sold on Amazon or anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Judy's Prime

customer_reviews.title: I so hated accounting in school and it has continued into my ...
customer_reviews.text: I so hated accounting in school and it has continued into my business. This was not helpful to me at all. I am a rebel so it is not likely I will find accounting a good thing ever. My way is simple and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Quickbooks Pro 2009 not the best choice
customer_reviews.text: This version replaces my 2003 version and although it has a few new features, they don't make up for the fact that the program keeps crashing/closing due to unexpected errors and every time I back up the files, it goes through the same process of warning about possibly wrong dates on sales orders and then rebuilding all the files. It's pretty frustrating -- I don't even use the feature that the program warns about and never have. Signed: Not too impressed!
customer_reviews.author: BytheBay

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product. It will lock you out after 30 days when trying to register. Complete waste of money. QuickBooks has all the older versions upgrading to their $200 product. You can't purchase a new older version.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Macias

customer_reviews.title: Old Is Good
customer_reviews.text: Intuit products have worked well for me, but it seemed like I had to update too often in order to use their tax software. I no longer use their tax software and have not had to update this software for years. Hopefully it will stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knauff

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed but time is up
customer_reviews.text: it was impossible to register. money down the drain. I am very disappointed but time is up. I can only try to use it on another machine.
customer_reviews.author: nancyr

customer_reviews.title: The software arrived earlier than promised and in good
customer_reviews.text: This is the student version and had been previously installed. However the provided information allowed me to install and use the software. The software arrived earlier than promised and in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Schardt

customer_reviews.title: It was registered under previous owner's name. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was registered under previous owner's name. It was out of date and was not get online support by the QuickBook company. It was conflict with the Window system for error function. Actually, it was not workable for current online updating. I should get refund for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic accounting software
customer_reviews.text: It works well foer all basis accounting functions...and integrates with add ons that allow you to quickly have a full service accounting program,
customer_reviews.author: Rick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quick Books
customer_reviews.text: Have been a Quick Books user since the first version. Love it! and recommend it to my clients. Didn't realize I was puchasing an "old 2009 version" - didn't say that in the listing or on any paper work but it's fine. Quick Books 2006 has major conflicts with Vista - causes computer to crash - data unretrievable - so beware. I found out the hard way. Fortunately I do a daily back up on a Seagate - learned that the hard way also.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The program is really too expensive for personal use. I use it but it is cumbersome
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of company's information data entries before actual general ledger input
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my taxes
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my taxes, and is great to know you have a reliable tool for preparing my business taxes.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Quickbooks 2009 worthless for multicurrency use
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended this software package by an Intuit representative for multicurrency accounting and currencies FOREX options. The software is multicurrency only partial, for example impossible to define accounts in multicurrency and Intuit support staff is clueless if asked questions not in their database in some instances they are also misleading STRONGLY RECOMMEND NOT TO BUY THIS SOFTWARE if true multicurrency use is needed. Intuit has designed a product to milk your hard earned $$$ that is all, no solution offered to true multicurrency environment.
customer_reviews.author: Haim Branisteanu

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: I started off with intuit's free dowmload version of quickbooks to try it out and liked it. I bought this version during a sale(the first time in my life that email marketing presented me with something I actually wanted). Some the reviews gave me pause but the price was right so I jump in. I had absolutely no issues with installation and it upgraded my existing "free" version file with no problems. The interface is different and things are not in the same places but with some searching you'll find them. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lechner

customer_reviews.title: 2009 Q/B
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Price & Love Q/B's & have since upgraded to Q/B 2015
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL B

customer_reviews.title: QB always has quirks and incompatibility issues
customer_reviews.text: QB always has quirks and incompatibility issues, and poor support and lame excuses
customer_reviews.author: SlashQuixote

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was using QuickBooks Pro 1999, and the change over was awesome. The download was easy the program is easy to use and understand. I had a damaged record in my backup file. I got a hold of support. They helped walk me through how to get the file repaired and get doing in 2009. Love this product and its operation
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick Books
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty good program easy to use easy to set up and well known to all. I am upgrading it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to get the newest QB so I just got the Pro 2009. And I like the program better than Quicken!
customer_reviews.author: shel

customer_reviews.title: Great Software
customer_reviews.text: Quickbooks makes it easier to track your income & expenses for your small business. It's fairly easy to use. I've been using it for years, learned how to use it on my own. Biggest problems with QB it seems that every time they upgrade software there are "new" features that you need to learn, and some old ones that may not work quite the same.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Illegal License
customer_reviews.text: This disk was licensed to another user and could not be activated. I am returning it. intuit was very helpful by phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The CD is bad, with no interest from supplier to replace.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this supplier. Bad products, with no customer interest. Have limited email with BAYVIEW on having refund or CD replaced..Have an issue with no feedback, they have yet to correct the error??
customer_reviews.author: inabmw

customer_reviews.title: Corp. Secretary
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that Federal tax forms are not in this version of Quickbooks Pro. Having to pay an additional $50.00 a year for the tax service to get this ability is not my idea of an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Diana F. Liles

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time QuickBooks user. I have been using this product for about a week now and so far have had no problems. I did have an Accountant help me set up my business on QuickBooks. That probably cut down a tremenous amount of time on the interview and set up process. It has been easy to navigate so far. It does make it easy to track your money using this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: QB cant be beat for small businesses.
customer_reviews.text: Does not matter what the version, Quickbooks is simple, easy and friendly! Great for new business owners and old. Vendor shipped immediately and product was what was advertised. No surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Useless Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I was stunned at what a piece of crap this is. I've used Quicken and it has served me well, and I thought Quickbooks would be a good upgrade to handle my inventory needs as well. Not only is there no good way to automate inventory management (am I the only person who doesn't want to re-enter a thousand different book titles?), but you can't automatically download PayPal account information (which Quicken does). I made the mistake of getting this as a digital download, so now I'm stuck with it with no return options. Be warned! Don't make the same mistake I did. DON'T BUY THIS LOADSTONE!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Okennon

customer_reviews.title: Good to work with
customer_reviews.text: Great response, very friendly...Would do business with them again. Had an issues with registration and they help solve the problem right away. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: fredames

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use, even for us 'dummies' Everything was well organized, and submissions were easy to make. Yves
customer_reviews.author: Yves Morrissette

customer_reviews.title: flaws
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Quick Books 2009 for our small business and overall it does it's job. My issue with it is I operate on widows vista and for some reason this version has lots of flaws and the program stops responding. It becomes an inconvenience when i am trying to work and my program stops responding.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Quickbooks needs some competition to bring their prices down to Earth. Over priced for a computer program. Bring on the competition so the prices come down to a reasonable number.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lyons

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: purchased a product that was registered in someone elses name and cant undo it. So the product is useless to me. It was advertised as registerable but that was untrue. Wont purchase anything from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: tjc

customer_reviews.title: Stolen  merchandise!
customer_reviews.text: This product should have been enabled at the point of purchase in the store from which it was stolen. Due to the fact it is stolen and was never enabled at the register I cannot activate it and it is therefore completely useless to me. I am disgusted!
customer_reviews.author: taken

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had been told a new version was to be released
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with Quickbooks 2009. However, I would have appreciated Amazon advising me that within a couple of weeks the 2010 version was to be released. So, techically the version I purchased was outdated shortly after I installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Business Need
customer_reviews.text: All small business needs this product and I have given it 5 stars because it has helped me with my business
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside Barber & Co

customer_reviews.title: QuickBooks Much Better Than Quicken
customer_reviews.text: After keeping the books for our club for 2009 on Quicken, I switched to QuickBooks Pro 2009 for my 2010 bookkeeping, and the new software is worth every penny. It does what I need to do so much better than Quicken, and sets up a much better paper trail. I think Quicken would be fine as a checkbook balancer for the home user, but I found it much too simplistic, and the reports function far too limited, to serve very well as a bookkeeping product for a club or organization.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Pool

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: works pretty goood. bought it for quickbooks pro training class and then started to use it for our business.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep up with customers
customer_reviews.text: It is so much different from the older version I had learned to use and is hard to find the answers to my questions in The Official Guide.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Trainer

customer_reviews.title: helpfull and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have no business background and found the software easy to use. I did purchase "Quickbooks 2009 for Dummies" however.
customer_reviews.author: wii fun

customer_reviews.title: Quickbooks Software
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. This is a great way for a small business person to keep up with the accounting activity in their firm. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad with this purchase. The QuickBooks box arrived in perfect conditions. The purchase arrived on time. I'm glad with the service the company have provided me.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered and Returned and Now Re-Ordering
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product and never installed it. Returned it. Thought I didn't need it. Now I know that I need it. Re-ordering and paying more. I'm upgrading from 2004. I now have Vista and have to have 2009. I'll let you know how things turn out.
customer_reviews.author: QuickBook User

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for previous version
customer_reviews.text: Programs were in perfect unused/sealed condition. Shipment was very prompt. Very glad that I could locate the "prior year version" to keep all my clients on the same year with me instead of constantly upgrading and spending more money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Donham

customer_reviews.title: Acctg Software
customer_reviews.text: I prefer rating items using the star method. I will no longer rate my purchases if I am REQUIRED to write a comment. 5 stars = I Love It .. and I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: quick books works well
customer_reviews.text: i have used quickbooks for twelve years. it work well for me. i have a service business with 15 to 20 employee i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hardy Miller

product_meta.title: QuickBooks Pro 2009 [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description: Platform:PC Disc| Format:BoxQuickbooks PRO 2009 RETAIL SML PKG
feature_bullets: Complete tasks like paying employees, invoicing, bill tracking and check writing
Track sales and expenses, and easily share this data in Word and Excel
Stay on top of your business by seeing who owes you money or which bills are coming due
Quickly create your own professional looking custom forms
